trans-unit.source: Tell me about app service
trans-unit.target: Tell me about app service

trans-unit.source: Azure Virtual Machines can handle a wide range of cloud hosting tasks.
trans-unit.target: Azure Virtual Machines can handle a wide range of cloud hosting tasks.

trans-unit.source: But creating and managing a VM infrastructure requires specialized skills and substantial effort.
trans-unit.target: But creating and managing a VM infrastructure requires specialized skills and substantial effort.

trans-unit.source: If you don't need complete control over the VMs that run your web apps, mobile app backends, API apps, etc., there's an easier (and cheaper) solution: *Platform as a Service* (PaaS).
trans-unit.target: If you don't need complete control over the VMs that run your web apps, mobile app backends, API apps, etc., there's an easier (and cheaper) solution: *Platform as a Service* (PaaS).

trans-unit.source: With PaaS, Azure handles most of the management work for the VMs that run your applications.
trans-unit.target: With PaaS, Azure handles most of the management work for the VMs that run your applications.

trans-unit.source: [Azure App Service](../article/app-service/app-service-value-prop-what-is.md) is a fully managed PaaS offering that allows you to build, deploy, and scale enterprise-grade apps in seconds.
trans-unit.target: [Azure App Service](../article/app-service/app-service-value-prop-what-is.md) is a fully managed PaaS offering that allows you to build, deploy, and scale enterprise-grade apps in seconds.

trans-unit.source: App Service is the best choice for many kinds of application workloads.
trans-unit.target: App Service is the best choice for many kinds of application workloads.

trans-unit.source: A corporation might want to build or migrate a commercial website that can handle millions of hits a week and is deployed in several data centers across the globe.
trans-unit.target: A corporation might want to build or migrate a commercial website that can handle millions of hits a week and is deployed in several data centers across the globe.

trans-unit.source: The same corporation might also have a line-of-business app that tracks expense reports for authenticated users from the corporate Active Directory, and the app might have a mobile device component and connect to on-premise resources and business processes.
trans-unit.target: The same corporation might also have a line-of-business app that tracks expense reports for authenticated users from the corporate Active Directory, and the app might have a mobile device component and connect to on-premise resources and business processes.

trans-unit.source: The expense reports might require periodic background jobs to calculate and summarize large volumes of information.
trans-unit.target: The expense reports might require periodic background jobs to calculate and summarize large volumes of information.

trans-unit.source: An IT consultant might adapt a popular open source application to set up a content management system for a small business.
trans-unit.target: An IT consultant might adapt a popular open source application to set up a content management system for a small business.

trans-unit.source: The figure below shows some of the kinds of web apps that can run in Azure App Service.
trans-unit.target: The figure below shows some of the kinds of web apps that can run in Azure App Service.

trans-unit.source: ![app service diagram](media/app-service-choose-me-content/diagram.png)
trans-unit.target: ![app service diagram](media/app-service-choose-me-content/diagram.png)

trans-unit.source: Figure: Azure App Service supports static web pages, popular web applications, and custom web applications built with various technologies.
trans-unit.target: Figure: Azure App Service supports static web pages, popular web applications, and custom web applications built with various technologies.

trans-unit.source: You can also run mobile backends, API app, and non-web compute workloads (using WebJobs).
trans-unit.target: You can also run mobile backends, API app, and non-web compute workloads (using WebJobs).

trans-unit.source: With Azure App Service, you can also run any kind of compute workload using the [WebJobs](../article/app-service-web/websites-webjobs-resources.md) feature.
trans-unit.target: With Azure App Service, you can also run any kind of compute workload using the [WebJobs](../article/app-service-web/websites-webjobs-resources.md) feature.

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service gives you the option of running on shared VMs that contain multiple apps created by multiple users, or on VMs that are used only by you.
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service gives you the option of running on shared VMs that contain multiple apps created by multiple users, or on VMs that are used only by you.

trans-unit.source: VMs are a part of a pool of resources managed by Azure App Service and thus allow for high reliability and fault tolerance.
trans-unit.target: VMs are a part of a pool of resources managed by Azure App Service and thus allow for high reliability and fault tolerance.

trans-unit.source: Getting started is easy.
trans-unit.target: Getting started is easy.

trans-unit.source: With Azure App Service, users can select from a range of applications, frameworks and template and create a web app in seconds.
trans-unit.target: With Azure App Service, users can select from a range of applications, frameworks and template and create a web app in seconds.

trans-unit.source: They can then use their favorite development tools (WebMatrix, Visual Studio, any other editor) and source control options to set up continuous integration and develop as a team.
trans-unit.target: They can then use their favorite development tools (WebMatrix, Visual Studio, any other editor) and source control options to set up continuous integration and develop as a team.

trans-unit.source: Applications that rely on a MySQL DB can consume a MySQL service provided for Azure by ClearDB, a Microsoft partner.
trans-unit.target: Applications that rely on a MySQL DB can consume a MySQL service provided for Azure by ClearDB, a Microsoft partner.

trans-unit.source: Developers can create large, scalable web applications with Azure App Service.
trans-unit.target: Developers can create large, scalable web applications with Azure App Service.

trans-unit.source: The technology supports creating applications using ASP.NET, PHP, Node.js and Python.
trans-unit.target: The technology supports creating applications using ASP.NET, PHP, Node.js and Python.

trans-unit.source: Applications can use sticky sessions, for example, and many existing web apps can be moved to this cloud platform with no changes.
trans-unit.target: Applications can use sticky sessions, for example, and many existing web apps can be moved to this cloud platform with no changes.

trans-unit.source: Web apps built on Azure App Service can use other aspects of Azure, such as Service Bus, SQL Database, and Blob Storage.
trans-unit.target: Web apps built on Azure App Service can use other aspects of Azure, such as Service Bus, SQL Database, and Blob Storage.

trans-unit.source: You can also run multiple copies of an application in different VMs, with Azure App Service automatically load balancing requests across them.
trans-unit.target: You can also run multiple copies of an application in different VMs, with Azure App Service automatically load balancing requests across them.

trans-unit.source: And because new web app instances are created in VMs that already exist, starting a new application instance happens very quickly; it's significantly faster than waiting for a new VM to be created.
trans-unit.target: And because new web app instances are created in VMs that already exist, starting a new application instance happens very quickly; it's significantly faster than waiting for a new VM to be created.

trans-unit.source: As the [figure](#appservice_diagram) above shows, you can publish code and other web content into Azure App Service in several ways.
trans-unit.target: As the [figure](#appservice_diagram) above shows, you can publish code and other web content into Azure App Service in several ways.

trans-unit.source: You can use FTP, FTPS, or Microsoft's WebDeploy technology.
trans-unit.target: You can use FTP, FTPS, or Microsoft's WebDeploy technology.

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service also supports publishing code from source control systems, including Git, GitHub, CodePlex, BitBucket, Dropbox, Mercurial, Team Foundation Server, and the cloud-based Team Foundation Service.
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service also supports publishing code from source control systems, including Git, GitHub, CodePlex, BitBucket, Dropbox, Mercurial, Team Foundation Server, and the cloud-based Team Foundation Service.
